transcripts.text: Here's a new video from my friend Brandon Kimber who was responding to statements made in a recent Todd White interview.

My friends at the Remnant Radio released an interview with Todd White asking him about his views about one of the most essential Christian doctrines, who is Jesus Christ?  Does Todd White believe the canonic Christ heresy?  In today's video I'm going to show you Todd teaching this in context and you can judge whether his critics were right in warning others of his false teaching.  in my film american gospel christ alone i presented clips which show todd white preaching the canonic christ.  jesus was not born into this world to be god which says that jesus was fully god but in the incarnation he emptied himself of all divinity which means his divine nature.
he was fully god and fully man But he had to lay aside all divinity, all of it, every bit of it.

He didn't live a sinless life, heal the sick, or do anything as God, but only as a man in right relationship with God.  The film counters this view by explaining the biblical view of Christ.  He was fully God and fully man, but he never emptied himself of divinity or his divine nature.  He emptied or humbled himself by adding to himself the veil of humanity.
Jesus didn't do what he did as God.  He did what he did as a man in perfect relationship with the Father.
Yes, Jesus was fully imbued with the presence of the Holy Spirit in him.  Yes, the Father was in him doing it.
